languages.text: "Я послал на подмогу осаждающим мир силам Эксплораторов свои войска, но между командирами возник... разлад. Им нужен авторитетный полководец, и вы отлично подходите на эту роль. Я ведь не ошибаюсь в вас, {name}?"

"I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"
languages.original_text: "Я послал на подмогу осаждающим мир силам Эксплораторов свои войска, но между командирами возник... разлад. Им нужен авторитетный полководец, и вы отлично подходите на эту роль. Я ведь не ошибаюсь в вас, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

"I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

"I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

"I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

languages.text: “开拓者的部队目前正在围攻这个世界，我也曾派遣部队进行增援，但那些指挥官之间出现了……嫌隙。他们需要一位信得过的将军，而你是最合适的人选。我相信，我对你的信任并没有错，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

traits.locale_text: “开拓者的部队目前正在围攻这个世界，我也曾派遣部队进行增援，但那些指挥官之间出现了……嫌隙。他们需要一位信得过的将军，而你是最合适的人选。我相信，我对你的信任并没有错，是吧？”

languages.text: «Envié mis tropas a ayudar a las fuerzas de exploradores que asedian el mundo, pero hay... discrepancias entre sus comandantes. Necesitan a un general con autoridad, papel que le viene a la perfección. Espero no equivocarme al confiar en usted, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

traits.locale_text: «Envié mis tropas a ayudar a las fuerzas de exploradores que asedian el mundo, pero hay... discrepancias entre sus comandantes. Necesitan a un general con autoridad, papel que le viene a la perfección. Espero no equivocarme al confiar en usted, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「あの星で包囲されたままの探索隊を救出するために私の部隊を送り込んだが…司令たちの間で揉め事が起きている。彼らには権限を持つ将が必要だが、その点においてお前は最適だ。私の確信が誤りではないと示してくれるな？」
languages.original_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

traits.locale_text: 「あの星で包囲されたままの探索隊を救出するために私の部隊を送り込んだが…司令たちの間で揉め事が起きている。彼らには権限を持つ将が必要だが、その点においてお前は最適だ。私の確信が誤りではないと示してくれるな？」

languages.text: « J'ai envoyé mes troupes aider les forces des explorators qui assiégeaient le monde, mais... une rupture s'est créée entre les commandants. Ils ont besoin d'un général à la poigne de fer, et vous avez le profil idéal pour ce rôle. J'ai bien sûr raison de vous faire confiance, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai envoyé mes troupes aider les forces des explorators qui assiégeaient le monde, mais... une rupture s'est créée entre les commandants. Ils ont besoin d'un général à la poigne de fer, et vous avez le profil idéal pour ce rôle. J'ai bien sûr raison de vous faire confiance, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Ich habe meine Truppen zur Unterstützung der Explorator-Streitkräfte entsendet, die die Welt belagern, aber es ... kam zu einem Streit unter den Commandern. Sie brauchen einen autoritären General, und Ihr seid perfekt für diese Rolle. Mein Vertrauen in Euch ist berechtigt, hoffe ich."
languages.original_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe meine Truppen zur Unterstützung der Explorator-Streitkräfte entsendet, die die Welt belagern, aber es ... kam zu einem Streit unter den Commandern. Sie brauchen einen autoritären General, und Ihr seid perfekt für diese Rolle. Mein Vertrauen in Euch ist berechtigt, hoffe ich."

languages.text: "Dünyayı kuşatan Keşiftör kuvvetlerine destek olmaları için birliklerimi gönderdim ama... Komutanlar arasında anlaşmazlık çıktı. Demir yumruklu bir generale ihtiyaçları var, tam senlik bir iş. Güvenimi boşa çıkarmazsın, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "I sent my troops to aid the Explorator forces laying siege to the world, but a... rift occurred among the commanders. They need an authoritative general, and you are perfect for the role. My confidence is not misplaced, I trust?"
